page.title: 03A RESIDENT OF EXMOUTH
page.content: We spoke to Mr. Mingo who lives in Bond Cottage. Mr Mingo has been retired for some years. He is grey haired, and carries a shooting stick. He has lived in Bond Cottage for 20 years. It is 700 years old and is owned by Clinton Estates.It has no electricity but gas lighting. It's on mains water,but there are also wells. Bond Cottage was 2 Cottages at one time, but is now just 1 cottage. It has a rayburn and a calor gas cooker. At the front of the house there is a good sized garden. He lets this along with his other 1 3/4 acres for grazing sheep and cattle. The outhouses were used as a milking parlor, but they are not safe now. Gore Lane's name came from a slaughter house along the lane from Bond Cottage. It was demolished some time ago.
